title.value: Efficiency of a herbicide buran super in fish-husbandry reservoirs by aviation application
Эффективность гервицида буран супер на рыбохозяйственных водоемах при авиационном внесении

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Shantyr, V.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the article the results of small-plot and farming trials on determining the herbicide Buran super, WS efficiency in fish husbandry water-storage reservoirs by aviation application are presented. The biological efficiency of the preparation Buran Super, aqueuos solution (glyphosate acid, 500 g/l) against annual and perennial weeds, including aquatic ones as bulrush, cats tail, cane was studied on the basis of fish husbandry farms of Minsk and Gomel regions (the Republic of Belarus). It is determined that by Buran super, WS application at the rate of 3,6-4,5 l/ha the biological efficiency against all weed species including the hydrophyte ones has made 97,4 - 99,1%. In the production experiment of the herbicide use in dose of 4.8 l/ha the killing of hydrophyte weeds, as well as annual and perennial dicotyledonous plants and grasses was stated in 99,7%. The efficiency of equal distribution of the herbicide by means of ultralow-volume spraying was determined by availability of GPS systems.
